Sub: CERTIFICATION OF SCREENERS
Certification of screeners has become a crucial issue in airport
operations. We are seriously falling short of screeners at every airport
mainly because the CASOs are not utilizing all the training slots allotted
to them at the ASTIs and are not ensuring that the personnel sent by
them for the screener's course pass the exam. The situation has
become so bad that at some airports the figure of personnel, who are
eligible for the screener's exam, is in double digits as per the list
enclosed at Annexure-"A".
2. lt has now been decided that the training and certification of
screeners will be monitored on a fortnightly basis at APS HQ and the
responsibility of ensuring that all the eligible SOs are trained and
undergo the training and clear the screener's exam will lie with the
respective CASO and the Zonal DlG. A record will be made at APS HQ
regarding those CASOs who do not ensure the above and entry shall be
made in their APARs. The Zonal DlsG shall monitor this in their
respective zones diligently and will accord it top priority and will also be
